__e: This choker scarf, and I only wore it because Josephine did and I thought that maybe if I were more like her, then... then maybe they would respect me.
Your humour is hollow I thought your enemies had killed you
And when it's over, reality is a bit flat and you're very tired.
Trap or no trap, the scarf is our only option.
You think I think that's her scarf, don't you?
But I also know Jamie and that's how I know it's not her scarf.
